title: Update gallery layout, shop name, and contact number

requirements.text: Change the shoe gallery layout from the current responsive grid to a 2-column grid format where shoes display two side by side in each row, continuing down the page

quotes: The pics of shoes should be like two side by side than two more side by side
Get two in row than more like that down in website

acceptanceCriteria: Shoe gallery displays exactly 2 shoes per row
Layout maintains consistent spacing between items
Grid continues vertically with multiple rows of 2 shoes each
Layout is responsive and maintains structure on different screen sizes

requirements.text: Update the shop name throughout the website from the current name to 'hari traders'

quotes: Change shop name to....... hari traders

acceptanceCriteria: Shop name displays as 'hari traders' in the hero section
Any other instances of the shop name are updated to 'hari traders'
Shop name maintains luxury styling and branding

requirements.text: Update both the WhatsApp and phone contact numbers to +919056156995 in the ContactInfo component

quotes: Whattsap number and contact number to....+919056156995

acceptanceCriteria: Phone contact button displays and links to +919056156995
WhatsApp contact button displays and links to +919056156995
Both buttons maintain their existing functionality and styling

constraints: Maintain the existing luxury theme and styling
Preserve the ContactInfo component's phone and WhatsApp button functionality
Keep the existing shoe images and product information
nonGoals: Adding new shoes to the gallery
Modifying the hero section layout beyond the shop name
Adding new contact methods beyond phone and WhatsApp
